description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dmifb","text":"This protocol makes 2L of pH 7.4 phosphate buffer. This solution is used for serial section 2-photon imaging. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1bsa3","text":"2 L GL45 bottle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae6bl","text":"Sodium phosphate monobasic monohydrateS23120-1000.0 1 kg(CAS 10049-21-5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":72}],"data":{}},{"key":"33rdr","text":"Sodium phosphate dibasic heptahydrate 5 kg ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":42}],"data":{}},{"key":"6g9fd","text":"magnetic stirrer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n1me","text":"weighing scales","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rhog","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0B6A842C088011EF835A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.melford.co.uk/products/biological-buffers/biological-buffers-r-s/sodium-phosphate-monobasic-monohydrate-1-kg.html?ga_list_name=Search%20(Grid%20View)"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"120D1034088011EF835A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.melford.co.uk/products/biological-buffers/biological-buffers-r-s/sodium-phosphate-dibasic-heptahydrate-5-kg.html"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5574f","text":"Fill 2L flask with MQ water to the  2L notch. Place on magnetic stirrer and set to 1000 RPM. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"du1s6","text":"Weigh   of   and pour into the flask. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8g6e1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3.1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":true,"cas_number":"10049-21-5","guid":"C4BE4E635EEA4B778CF079298C76C121","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Sodium Phosphate Monobasic Monohydrate","pubchem_id":"0","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"S23120-1000.0","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.melford.co.uk/products/biological-buffers/biological-buffers-r-s/sodium-phosphate-monobasic-monohydrate-1-kg.html?ga_list_name=Search%20(Grid%20View)","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.melford.co.uk","name":"Melford"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44len","text":"Pour   weighed out above into flask. Screw on lid and shake once to ensure no solute is stuck around the rim of the flask. Return to stirring plate at 1000 RPM. {"blocks":[{"key":"45jig","text":"Use PB once all solute is dissolved. Do not refrigerate: cold PB will form bubbles as it warms and this interferes with imaging. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
